column2: Custom UIView for iOS that pops up an animated "bubble" pointing at a button or other view. Useful for popup tips.

column5: message
bumps version number

Merge pull request #134 from jasonzb/master

Prevent dismissTarget from being repeatedly added to containerView.
Prevent dismissTarget from being repeatedly added to containerView.

Solve bubble padding (chrismiles#132)

Removed deprecated property 'shouldEnforceCustomViewPadding' from DEMO project.

Solve bubble padding (chrismiles#132)

Removed IF conditions for property "shouldEnforceCustomViewPadding", so the correct bubble size is always calculated based on properties cornerRadius, bubblePaddingX and bubblePaddingY.

Solve bubble padding (chrismiles#132)

Deprecate property "shouldEnforceCustomViewPadding" as solution for chrismiles#132. Added a deprecation warning, so users who have this property in their code will see a Xcode warning when updating to the new version.

Added comment for dismissAlongWithUserInteraction property.

Default is NO.

Added dismissAlongWithUserInteraction property.

Dismiss along with user interaction if YES. For example, users can
scroll down a table view when a tip view is shown. The tip view dismiss
when he or she touches down and user interaction continues.

Text being drawn with fractional sizes may not always render

More minor cleanup.
Minor cleanup.
Prevent bubble from assuming the padding is necessary when resizing. Provide option to automatically mask customView.
Add option to not enforce customView padding.

Introduce new method `isBeingShown` to query whether the tooltip is
already being presented. For example, this helps in case you want to
present the tooltip by single tapping another UIView object. If you
simply call `presentPointingAtView`, it will rebuild the entire view
and re-animate its presentation.

Avoids rendering on non-integral pixels.

Use -drawWithRect:options:attributes:context: and -boundingRectWithSize:options:attributes:context: when they are available. Fixes rendering under iOS7 with 64-bit without breaking backwards compatibility.
Fixed hasShadow not setting its backing ivar.
Fixed an integer conversion.

Merge pull request #33 from martinjbaker/master

Border improvement + pointer position fix
Made 3D highlight and shadow colors compatible with ARC. Previously the UIColor was getting before the CGColorRef was assigned to fill and shadow.
moved border drawing to happen after 3D effect. Fixed aliasing issue with 3D effect, visible when borderWidth = 0.
Added 3D style option with top highlight and bottom shadow on the bubble. New has3DStyle BOOL property.
Fixed shadow cropping problems by removing shadow from drawRect and using CALayer instead. Added hasShadow BOOL property.
Fixed horizontal position of pointer being 2pts to the right since the sidePadding offset on origin of bubbleFrame wasn't being accounted for.
Removed clipping to bubblePath when drawing black stroke to give better looking result.
Refactors dismiss by user handling to clean up; removes fade out background effect.

Lets you init the pop tip view with title and message, displaying a
separately style-able (font, color, alignment) title string.
add defaultDirection

Cleaned up auto dismiss handling, preventing a crash in certain cases.
